name: Skateboard Freestyle Skater 3D
description:
Grab your skateboard and go for a ride in your new city. Show the pedestrians who rules the streets, but not very hard. Have in mind that if you bump into someone it will reduce your speed and will really hurt you.
Nobody wants that, right? Choose your favorite skater and feel the adrenaline as go faster and faster. How long will you stand hurtless? The longer, the more points will be added to your score and the more respect you'll gain
from people in town. Of course, that's not an easy goal. Do you have what it takes?

GAME HIGHLIGHTS:
- Daily Rewards
- 7 Unlockable Skaters
- 4 Unlockable Game Modes
- Custom Difficulty
- Multiple levels
- Custom Weather
